name: Record 46
description:
Record 46 is first a horror game developed by Kicked Mesh Studio.

Late at night in a provincial town in America, the police station received a call from a frightened girl. Loud screams were heard in the house opposite, accompanied by bright flashes of mysterious origin. The law enforcement officers who arrived at the call did not find bodies or murder weapons, but pools of blood on the floor clearly indicated a brutal reprisal against the inhabitants of the house. But what happened that night, and who is behind it?

The player will be in the role of one of the police officers who arrived on a mysterious call, and find out the whole truth hiding within the walls of the old house. Search for cassettes, view them on an old VHS player, solve puzzles and avoid dangers as the writers of frightening recordings in Record 46

You can support the development of new games at this link
